name: Elena Chen
summary: Results-driven Data Analyst with a background in STEM education and 4 years of experience in the healthcare industry. Proficient in SQL with a proven track record of leveraging data to drive strategic business decisions and improve operational efficiency.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Led the development of predictive models using SQL to optimize patient scheduling, resulting in a 15% reduction in wait times.

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Managed a team in analyzing healthcare data to identify cost-saving opportunities, leading to a 20% decrease in operational expenses.

projects.name: Patient Outcome Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict patient outcomes, improving accuracy by 20% using Python and Tableau.

projects.name: Operational Efficiency Dashboard
projects.description: Created a dashboard to monitor key performance metrics, resulting in a 25% increase in operational efficiency utilizing SQL and Power BI.
